name: Ha-Kha-Ma-Ne-Shi inspired sword
description:
Leaf shape golden sword, a relic inspired by a kingdom lost to the ages. Probably existed in an alternate reality where apes ruled over the earth with strange culture.

Notice the carvings on the sword, see the Easter egg? The hilt is designed by 4 gorilla heads with expensive jewelry in their eyes, also the guard is designed by two demon cow heads again with jewelry in their eyes, overall 3 kind of jewelry is used on the handle: "Zomorod", "Yaghut" and "Firooze"

This sword shines on the light as if it is the sun itself! used only by high ranking generals.

2K (2048x2048) rendered
